name: Missile Mayhem
description:
Missile mayhem is a 2D Shoot-Em-Up game in space with lasers and missiles.

Dodge and shoot the incoming missiles to gain points.

Enjoy :)

//-----[ CONTROLS ]-----\\

Left click - shoot

WASD - move around

ESC - pause menu

R - restart game

//-------[ IMAGES USED]-------\\
Backgrounds & player: https://gamedevelopment.tutsplus.com/articles/enjoy-these-totally-free-space-bas...

//-------[ AUDIO ]-------\\
Missile launch sound: http://www.audiomicro.com/free-sound-effects/free-amusement-and-games
Game over explosion sound: https://www.zapsplat.com/?s=explosion
Lasers: https://www.zapsplat.com/sound-effect-category/lasers-and-weapons/page/4/
Music: https://ozzed.net/music/cor-metallicum.shtml#download
